ygData.subject: Re: Web Update
ygData.msgSnippet: Has everyone on this game gone postal???!!! WHO CARES!!! If he has an update to his web site and he wants to post it up here for people to check out, LET HIM!!
ygData.messageBody:
Has everyone on this game gone postal???!!! WHO CARES!!! If he has an update
to his web site and he wants to post it up here for people to check out, LET
HIM!! It does deal with EQ and that should be all that really matters. I am
seeing a bad trend on the message board and in game and it has a lot to do
with things like this. PEOPLE ARE GETTING RUDE. I had better run ins with
pkers on UO then with the people im seeing in EQ and the mailing list.
Please, Everyone just sit back, relax, and enjoy the info we recieve. I know
as well as anyone else reading these that your probably at work, if you
werent you would be playing right now, so dont tell me you have something
better to be doing then reading these posts. I'm not saying post anything
and everything, but this mailing list has done very well about staying on
subject, a couple of links to eq info sites is not going to kill anyone.

Rant over, return to your normal blacksmithing news.



>From: patrick.r.baxter@...
>Reply-To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Web Update
>Date: Tue, 4 May 1999 14:56:37 -0700
>
>From: patrick.r.baxter@...
>
>I believe you should not send your personal wab page updates to this forum
>as it does apply to blacksmithing. If you wish you can send us an update
>for when you change you blacksmithing guide. Other than that I think that
>I
>can say that WE don't really have an interest in what happens to the rest
>of
>your web site.
>
>There are other forums you could subscribe and send your web page updates
>to. This is a blacksmithing one so this is not the place for you.
>
>Thank you.
>
>Ailen
>Rallos Zek
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: John Danielson [mailto:clu@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 12:35 PM
>To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Re: Web Update
>
>
>You didn't need to quote the whole thing, and the only way not to receive
>those updates is to not subscribe to this mailing list altogether. It'd be
>the same if you mailed this list an update of your EQ page (imagine that
>you have one), everyone gets it, whether or not their interested.
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Wanting to get back in touch with old friends?
>http://www.onelist.com
>Reunite through a ONElist community.
